$60k",type:"Full-time",accessible:true,category:"Design"}];export function JobListings(_ref){let{onNavigate,onJobSelect}=_ref;const[selectedCategory,setSelectedCategory]=useState("All");const filteredJobs=selectedCategory==="All"?jobs:jobs.filter(job=>job.category===selectedCategory);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"jobs-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"jobs-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Job Opportunities"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"categories",children:categories.map(cat=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setSelectedCategory(cat),className:selectedCategory===cat?"category active":"category",children:cat},cat))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"jobs-count",children:[filteredJobs.length," jobs available"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"jobs-list",children:filteredJobs.map(job=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"job-card",onClick:()=>onJobSelect(job.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"job-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:job.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:job.company})]}),job.accessible&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Accessibility,{className:"accessibility-icon"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"job-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"job-type",children:job.type}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"job-location",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MapPin,{})," ",job.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"job-salary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DollarSign,{})," ",job.salary]})]})]},job.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BottomNav,{currentScreen:"home",onNavigate:onNavigate})]});}
